TopicTitle: I have landed, in a pile of kerbals bodies

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I have fought it for a while and thought that this game was just going to be "One of those games", not sure what I mean, but I do mean it. I was sitting down and watching one of my favorite Youtubers named RObbaz (which you should totally check out) and he was playing KSP, working on his viking technologies. Once I seen the planes, Space stations, Moon landings and Boats I was sold.

I hope to find a fun and friendly community with you guys (mostly because they are few and far between).

In short, Hi.
This RObbaz . . . he is well known here. You are among friends.
Oh, so you too are a mighty viking. Welcome to the family!
Welcome Fellow Viking In This Forum Of Robbaz And Cake And Cats And Dogs
Welcome to the best game forum iv been to ^^
